title: Constants syscall.TIOCGETA and syscall.TIOCSETA got undefined in release 60.1
body:
by **pkorotkov**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
Try to use syscall.TIOCGETA or syscall.TIOCSETA in code.

What is the expected output?
Normal compiling

What do you see instead?
Errors:
    undefined: syscall.TIOCGETA
    undefined: syscall.TIOCSETA

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?
8g

Which operating system are you using?
uname -a
Linux XXX 2.6.38-11-generic #50-Ubuntu SMP Mon Sep 12 21:18:14 UTC 2011 i686 i686 i386
GNU/Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
fd30c132d1bd (release-branch.r60) release/release.r60.1
